N1.label: Iron Ore Cash Generation
N1.description: Iron Ore Cash Generation — Pilbara Delivers
N1.plain_english: Rio's Pilbara iron ore system is the world's lowest-cost major operation, generating exceptional cash flow at current prices.
N1.what_to_watch: Iron ore prices, Pilbara shipment volumes, C1 cost trajectory.
N1.upside: Material re-rating if iron ore prices sustain above US$100/t and copper ramp accelerates.
N1.risk_plain: If iron ore breaks below US$90/t, earnings compress significantly.

N2.label: Energy Transition Portfolio
N2.description: Energy Transition Portfolio — Copper and Lithium Optionality
N2.plain_english: Rio is building significant positions in copper (Oyu Tolgoi) and lithium (Arcadium) for the energy transition.
N2.what_to_watch: Oyu Tolgoi ramp-up progress, copper prices, Arcadium integration, lithium price recovery.
N2.upside: If copper and lithium contribute 30-40% of EBITDA by 2030, significant re-rating potential.
N2.risk_plain: If growth projects face cost overruns or commodity prices remain depressed, capital is destroyed.

N3.label: China Demand Slowdown
N3.description: China Demand Slowdown — Property Sector Drag
N3.plain_english: China's property sector downturn reduces steel and iron ore demand structurally.
N3.what_to_watch: China steel production, property sector starts, iron ore port inventories.
N3.risk_plain: If China steel production declines below 950Mtpa, iron ore prices could break below US$80/t.

N4.label: Growth Capex Risk
N4.description: Growth Capex Risk — Simandou and Arcadium Execution
N4.plain_english: Over US$15B in growth capital committed to Simandou, Arcadium, and Oyu Tolgoi carries execution risk.
N4.what_to_watch: Simandou first ore timing, Arcadium impairment testing, total capex vs free cash flow.
N4.risk_plain: If project execution falters, capital deployed destroys value and shareholder returns are reduced.

big_picture: Rio Tinto Limited (ASX: RIO) — coverage initiated. Full analysis pending.

crossover.description: 50-day MA marginally above 200-day MA ($2.30 spread). No decisive crossover signal. MAs are converging, indicating lack of trend conviction.

trend.structure: Range-bound between A$105 and A$130 since August 2025. Multiple failed breakouts above $125 and failed breakdowns below $108. Stock is a commodity price proxy with limited independent trend.

resistance.method: Multiple rejection level + prior high cluster

priorSpikes.context: China stimulus package announcement drove 8% rally

inflectionPoints.event: CY2024 results — solid but priced in, stock sold off 5%
Iron ore below US$90/t briefly — stock hit 52-week low
China stimulus package — 20% rally in 3 weeks
